name: movies
description: This table contains all dataset movies.

columns.name: duration
columns.description: Total runtime of the movie in minutes.

columns.name: budget
columns.description: Total budget allocated for the movie in US dollars.

columns.name: revenue
columns.description: Total revenue earned by the movie in US dollars.

columns.name: director_id
columns.description: Director's ID from the `director` table linking the director to the movie.

columns.name: imdb_slug
columns.description: Unique IMDb URL slug for the movie.

columns.name: sequel_id
columns.description: A sequel (follow up) movie ID from the `movies` table.
